Text: Cannabis stocks Canopy Growth (NYSE:CGC), Aurora Cannabis (NYSE:ACB), and Cronos Group (NASDAQ:CRON) fell 6.2%, 6.3%, and 8.6%, respectively, following Zamparo's warning.
Effect: Cannabis stocks Canopy Growth (NYSE:CGC), Aurora Cannabis (NYSE:ACB), and Cronos Group (NASDAQ:CRON) fell 6.2%, 6.3%, and 8.6%, respectively
